remixlab.proscene
Enum Scene.CameraKeyboardAction

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Scene.CameraKeyboardAction>
      remixlab.proscene.Scene.CameraKeyboardAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scene.CameraKeyboardAction>
Enclosing class:
Scene
public static enum Scene.CameraKeyboardAction
extends java.lang.Enum<Scene.CameraKeyboardAction>

Defines the different camera actions that can be associated with a specific keyboard key. Actions are defined here, but bindings are defined at the CameraProfile level, i.e., the scene acts like a bridge between the CameraProfile and proscene low-level classes.

Enum Constant Summary
